verses.verse: Doth not wisdom<WH2451> cry<WH7121>? and understanding<WH8394> put forth<WH5414> her voice<WH6963>?
She standeth<WH5324> in the top<WH7218> of high places<WH4791>, by the way<WH1870> in the places<WH1004> of the paths<WH5410>.
She crieth<WH7442> at<WH3027> the gates<WH8179>, at the entry<WH6310> of the city<WH7176>, at the coming<WH3996> in at the doors<WH6607>.
Unto you, O men<WH376>, I call<WH7121>; and my voice<WH6963> is to the sons<WH1121> of man<WH120>.
O ye simple<WH6612>, understand<WH995> wisdom<WH6195>: and, ye fools<WH3684>, be ye of an understanding<WH995> heart<WH3820>.
Hear<WH8085>; for I will speak<WH1696> of excellent things<WH5057>; and the opening<WH4669> of my lips<WH8193> shall be right things<WH4339>.
For my mouth<WH2441> shall speak<WH1897> truth<WH571>; and wickedness<WH7562> is an abomination<WH8441> to my lips<WH8193>. an: Heb. the abomination of my lips
All the words<WH561> of my mouth<WH6310> are in righteousness<WH6664>; there is nothing froward<WH6617> or perverse<WH6141> in them. froward: Heb. wreathed
They are all plain<WH5228> to him that understandeth<WH995>, and right<WH3477> to them that find<WH4672> knowledge<WH1847>.
Receive<WH3947> my instruction<WH4148>, and not silver<WH3701>; and knowledge<WH1847> rather than choice<WH977> gold<WH2742>.
For wisdom<WH2451> is better<WH2896> than rubies<WH6443>; and all the things that may be desired<WH2656> are not to be compared<WH7737> to it.
I wisdom<WH2451> dwell<WH7931> with prudence<WH6195>, and find out<WH4672> knowledge<WH1847> of witty inventions<WH4209>. prudence: or, subtilty
The fear<WH3374> of the LORD<WH3068> is to hate<WH8130> evil<WH7451>: pride<WH1344>, and arrogancy<WH1347>, and the evil<WH7451> way<WH1870>, and the froward<WH8419> mouth<WH6310>, do I hate<WH8130>.
Counsel<WH6098> is mine, and sound wisdom<WH8454>: I am understanding<WH998>; I have strength<WH1369>.
By me kings<WH4428> reign<WH4427>, and princes<WH7336> decree<WH2710> justice<WH6664>.
By me princes<WH8269> rule<WH8323>, and nobles<WH5081>, even all the judges<WH8199> of the earth<WH776>.
I love<WH157> them that love<WH157> me; and those that seek me early<WH7836> shall find<WH4672> me.
Riches<WH6239> and honour<WH3519> are with me; yea, durable<WH6276> riches<WH1952> and righteousness<WH6666>.
My fruit<WH6529> is better<WH2896> than gold<WH2742>, yea, than fine gold<WH6337>; and my revenue<WH8393> than choice<WH977> silver<WH3701>.
I lead<WH1980> in the way<WH734> of righteousness<WH6666>, in the midst<WH8432> of the paths<WH5410> of judgment<WH4941>: lead: or, walk
That I may cause those that love<WH157> me to inherit<WH5157> substance<WH3426>; and I will fill<WH4390> their treasures<WH214>.
The LORD<WH3068> possessed<WH7069> me in the beginning<WH7225> of his way<WH1870>, before<WH6924> his works<WH4659> of old.
I was set up<WH5258> from everlasting<WH5769>, from the beginning<WH7218>, or ever<WH6924> the earth<WH776> was.
When there were no depths<WH8415>, I was brought forth<WH2342>; when there were no fountains<WH4599> abounding<WH3513> with water<WH4325>.
Before the mountains<WH2022> were settled<WH2883>, before<WH6440> the hills<WH1389> was I brought forth<WH2342>:

While as yet he had not made<WH6213> the earth<WH776>, nor the fields<WH2351>, nor the highest part<WH7218> of the dust<WH6083> of the world<WH8398>. fields: or, open places the highest: or, the chief part
When he prepared<WH3559> the heavens<WH8064>, I was there: when he set<WH2710> a compass<WH2329> upon the face<WH6440> of the depth<WH8415>: a compass: or, a circle
When he established<WH553> the clouds<WH7834> above<WH4605>: when he strengthened<WH5810> the fountains<WH5869> of the deep<WH8415>:

When he gave<WH7760> to the sea<WH3220> his decree<WH2706>, that the waters<WH4325> should not pass<WH5674> his commandment<WH6310>: when he appointed<WH2710> the foundations<WH4144> of the earth<WH776>:
Then I was by him<WH681>, as one brought up<WH525> with him: and I was daily<WH3117> <WH3117> his delight<WH8191>, rejoicing<WH7832> always<WH6256> before<WH6440> him;
Rejoicing<WH7832> in the habitable part<WH8398> of his earth<WH776>; and my delights<WH8191> were with the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>.
Now therefore hearken<WH8085> unto me, O ye children<WH1121>: for blessed<WH835> are they that keep<WH8104> my ways<WH1870>.
Hear<WH8085> instruction<WH4148>, and be wise<WH2449>, and refuse<WH6544> it not.
Blessed<WH835> is the man<WH120> that heareth<WH8085> me, watching<WH8245> daily<WH3117> <WH3117> at my gates<WH1817>, waiting<WH8104> at the posts<WH4201> of my doors<WH6607>.
For whoso findeth<WH4672> me findeth<WH4672> <WH4672> life<WH2416>, and shall obtain<WH6329> favour<WH7522> of the LORD<WH3068>. obtain: Heb. bring forth
But he that sinneth<WH2398> against me wrongeth<WH2554> his own soul<WH5315>: all they that hate<WH8130> me love<WH157> death<WH4194>.
